AI Description: MVAPICH (MPI for MVAPICH2) is an open-source MPI implementation that delivers high performance, scalability, and fault tolerance for parallel computing on large HPC systems. It is specifically designed for InfiniBand and Omni-Path architectures.
Core Features: High Performance Mpi Implementation, Scalability For Large Parallel Computing, Fault Tolerance, Support For Infiniband & Omni-Path Architectures
General Tags: Hpc, Mpi, Parallel Computing, High Performance Computing
